lines: 1. Pa lupanda pa-liba umweo. Yes' ati, "Lolesha Ine;"
Ifyuma fya mu calo fibi, Kano ifyuma fya pa lupanda.
Kupusu ka lolesha, lolesha pa Kalvari
2. l-lyo nalole-sha Mupusushi, Namona cimwemwe cakwe;
Nga naponena mu matunko, Ndasanga amaka pa lupanda.
3. Na-ku-lacetekelo lupanda, Pamo na malayo yakwe;
Pa-ntu takawe mu matunko, Wacetekela maka ya mulu.
